name: Little Bottle Tale
description:
This game was made for BlackThornProd game jam 

with the theme: Less is More

The less your Health the More you deal damage

Story:

you are a bottle that got thrown into the Water Ways, and your goal is to get out of it and reach the recycle room,  the dream of every bottle.

Movement:

Walk and aim with: WASD/Arrows

Jump with: Space/X

Shoot with: Enter/Shift/Z

Credits:

Pixel Art, Design, Coding By Ven.

Music By Noha.

Assets used:
